## ScriptHostOptions.defaultTimeout property

The default interval, in milliseconds, that is allowed to elapse after sending a request before the request is considered to have timed out.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultTimeout?: number;
```

## Remarks

The default value is `30000`<!-- -->. Specify zero or a negative value to disable timeout.
